title: [角色|信息]mcMMO Combat Level —— mcMMO的可视化战斗力插件[1.7.2|1.7.9|1.8|1.6]
author: 矿工小周
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 08:40 编辑 

又是小周转插件的时候了
这次转的是一个类似于FightPower（我一直吐槽这个所谓战斗力的翻译）的插件，是国外制作的，论坛内搜索没搜到（关键词为：mcMMO，等级，战斗）就来转载了
[diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore]插件能够做到的[diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore][diamond_ore]

用mcMMO等级计算出你的战斗力然后显示在用户名下和聊天框用户名前
[iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore]命令[iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore][iron_ore]
/level 或者/combatlevel 显示玩家的战斗等级.
另外声明，这个插件没有权限节点。战斗等级的改变完全依靠mcMMO等级改变
[lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore]战斗力算法[lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore]
（搏斗 + 剑术 + 斧技 + 箭术 + (.25 * 杂技) + (.25 * 驯兽)) / 45，每项最多取1000 总的战斗等级100封顶0为最少
[gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore]配置[gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore][gold_ore]

enable_prefix : True by default, this is the prefix to the left of the name in chat.（是否开启聊天前缀）enable_tag_level : True by default, this is the level that appears above the player's head（是否开启玩家头上的显示）tag_name : "Combat" by default，the text that appears after the level above the player's head（玩家头上显示的文字，最好改“战斗力”）tag_color : GREEN by default, this is the color of the tag_name（玩家上方等级颜色）prefix_bracket_color : GOLD by default, change the color of the brackets in the level prefix（聊天前缀括号颜色）prefix_level_color : DARK_GREEN by default, change the color of the level in the prefix（聊天前缀等级颜色）

图：

网盘已经放出。至于汉化，整个插件只有Combat即配置中的[size=14.2857151031494px]tag_name一项是能见的英文（其余都无用），所以无需汉化
